00053 void NTee::startChildProc() {
00054 
00055    //** Replace any @NTEEPORT values in R_cmd with the actual port number
00056    char** ptr = &s_.R_cmd[1];
00057    while( *ptr ) {
00058       if ( strcmp( *ptr, "@NTEEPORT" ) == 0 )
00059          snprintf( *ptr, 9,"%d",srvPort_);
00060       else if ( strcmp( *ptr, "@NTEESERVERADDR" ) == 0 )
00061          snprintf( *ptr, 15, serverhost_.c_str());
00062 
00063       ++ptr;
00064    }
00065 
00066    //** Start the client.
00067    pid_t pid;
00068    if ( (pid=fork()) == 0 ) {
00069       // in the child.
00070       SysErrIf( execvp( s_.R_cmd[0], s_.R_cmd ) == -1 );
00071    }
00072    SysErrIf( pid == -1 ).info("Unable to fork properly\n");
00073 }

00085 Socket NTee::constructService( sockaddr_in* psa, socklen_t* plen )
00086 {
00087    Socket sock;
00088    int type = (s_.protocol==Settings::TCP)? SOCK_STREAM : SOCK_DGRAM;   
00089    SysErrIf( (sock=socket(AF_INET, type, 0 )) == -1 );
00090 
00091    // Here we set the close-on-exec flag for the socket, because we don't want
00092    // it to carry over to the client process.
00093    SysErrIf( fcntl( sock, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC ) == -1 );
00094    
00095    // Set up the internet address and port 
00096    memset( psa, 0, *plen);
00097    psa->sin_family = AF_INET;
00098    psa->sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00099    psa->sin_port = htons(s_.srv_port);  // 0 is the wildcard port
00100    SysErrIf( bind(sock, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(psa),
00101                   *plen) == -1);
00102 
00103    // Get values for whatever the kernel decided to bind us to.
00104    SysErrIf( getsockname(sock, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(psa),
00105                          plen) == -1 );
00106 
00107    char buf[INET_ADDRSTRLEN];
00108    inet_ntop(AF_INET, psa, buf, *plen);
00109    std::cout << "Server on: " << buf 
00110              << ":" << ntohs(psa->sin_port) << "\n"; 
00111 
00112    //** Save the server port that was assigned and the host address  
00113    serverhost_.assign(buf);
00114    srvPort_ = ntohs(psa->sin_port);
00115 
00116    
00117    // magic # 5 is just what most examples use.
00118    SysErrIf( listen(sock,5) == -1 );
00119    
00120    return sock;
00121 }

00130 void NTee::startListening()
00131 {
00132    int rc=0;
00133    fd_set rd_fds;
00134    int max = std::max(Lsock_,Rsock_);
00135 
00136    // force both L and R sockets to be non-blocking IO.
00137    fcntl(Lsock_, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK);
00138    fcntl(Rsock_, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK);
00139       
00140    FD_ZERO(&rd_fds);
00141    FD_SET(Lsock_, &rd_fds);
00142    FD_SET(Rsock_, &rd_fds);
00143    
00144    std::string msg;
00145    std::cout << "Polling\n";
00146    char buf[1024];
00147    
00148    while( (rc=select(max+1, &rd_fds, 0, 0, 0)) > 0 ) {
00149       std::cout << "Select returned: " << rc << "\n";
00150       if ( FD_ISSET( Lsock_, &rd_fds ) )
00151          transfer(Lsock_,Rsock_);
00152          
00153       if ( FD_ISSET( Rsock_, &rd_fds ) )
00154          transfer(Rsock_,Lsock_);
00155       
00156       FD_ZERO(&rd_fds);
00157       FD_SET(Lsock_, &rd_fds);
00158       FD_SET(Rsock_, &rd_fds);
00159       
00160    }
00161    
00162 }

00165 void NTee::transfer( const Socket& from, const Socket& to )
00166 {
00167    char* buf = 0;
00168    size_t len = read_n( from, &buf );
00169    boost::shared_ptr<char> ptr( buf, free );
00170 
00171    std::cout << "Reading from " << from << " --> " 
00172              << to << " (" << len << ")\n";
00173    if ( len > 0 )
00174       write_n( to, buf, len );
00175    else
00176       close(from);
00177 
00178    alertRecorders(from, to, buf, len);
00179 }

00183 void NTee::alertRecorders(const Socket& from, const Socket& to, 
00184                           const char* buf, 
00185                           size_t len)
00186 {
00187    std::for_each( recorders_.begin(), recorders_.end(),
00188                   boost::bind(&Recorder::record, _1) );
00189 }

00206 int NTee::start()
00207 {
00208    //** Build up the service port.
00209    sockaddr_in addr;
00210    socklen_t len = sizeof(addr);
00211    Socket sock = constructService( &addr, &len );
00212    
00213    //** Not going to accept yet! Instead, we start the client.
00214    startChildProc();
00215          
00216    // Back in the parent (ntee) otherwise we'd have exited.
00217    SysErrIf( (Rsock_=accept(sock, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr),
00218                              &len)) == -1 );
00219       
00220    // Report the client connection.
00221    char buf[INET_ADDRSTRLEN];
00222    inet_ntop(AF_INET, &addr, buf, sizeof(addr));   
00223    std::cout << "Client connection: " << buf
00224              << ":" << ntohs(addr.sin_port) << "\n";
00225    
00226    //** R process has connected... time to connect to the L process.
00227    int type = (s_.protocol==Settings::TCP)? SOCK_STREAM : SOCK_DGRAM;   
00228    SysErrIf( (Lsock_=socket(AF_INET, type, 0 )) == -1 );
00229 
00230    // Set up the internet address and port 
00231    memset(&addr, 0, sizeof(addr));
00232    SysErrIf( inet_pton(AF_INET, s_.L_host_ip.c_str(),
00233                        reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr)) <= 0 );
00234    addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00235    addr.sin_port = htons(s_.L_port);
00236 
00237    SysErrIf( connect(Lsock_, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr),
00238                      sizeof(addr)) == -1 );
00239                        
00240    std::cout << "NTee connected to L side: " << s_.L_host_ip << ":"
00241              << s_.L_port << "\n";
00242    
00243    //** Start listening to both sides and passing the information.
00244    startListening();
00245    
00246    return 0;
00247 }

00261 {
00262    recorders_.push_back( r );
